alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; San Jacinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 10:47PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Montgomery, south central San Jacinto, northwestern Liberty and northeastern Harris Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1047 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Splendora, or 10 miles southwest of Cleveland, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Splendora, Patton Village, Roman Forest, Woodbranch, Plum Grove, North Cleveland, Porter Heights, Tarkington Prairie, Moss Hill and New Caney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; San Jacinto
